name: Shield in Orbit
description:
Shield in Orbit

You are now part of the elite Space Fox squad. Your mission is to defend Planet earth from asteroid rains while extracting the humans happens. You must also protect the HOPEs the space station And collect the HOPEs parts.

Developed:  by Fábio Vaz  (Programming & Design) and Eder Santana (Art & Animation )

Music / Sound-Effect: zapsplat.com
